extensions.description: Treat URLs ending with these extensions as images.

whitelist_rules.description: Always treat URLs matching these host/path rules as images (even without extension).

path_chars.description: Path must start with this string. Leave empty to match all paths on this host.

convert_markdown.description: Convert Markdown image syntax ![alt](url) to image components.

convert_cq_code.description: Convert CQ:image codes to image components.

randomize_seed.description: Automatically randomize 'seed' query parameter to prevent caching of random image APIs.
